Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to excavation of underground facilities; expands the definition of "excavation" for the purposes of the protection of underground facilities
Summary: Expands the definition of "excavation" for the purposes of the protection of underground facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง119-b, Pub Serv L; amd ยง760, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the general business law, in relation to excavation of underground facilities
